name: YouTuber Bash
description:
YouTuber Bash

By Alyssa Montgomery and Harlee Turnbow

A 2D top down action game where popular YouTubers fight enemies, made for a college Unity Game Development 2 course.

Featuring YouTubers:

  • Jaiden Animations
  • Jazza
  • Safiya Nygaard
  • ProblemsofaBookNerd
  • Good Mythical Morning
  • MatPat from The Game Theorists
  • Rosanna Pansino
  • NerdForge
  • Pixielocks
  • The Fitness Marshall
  • Markiplier
  • MrBeast
  • Dude Perfect
  • Linus Tech Tips

CREDITS

Developed & pixel art by Alyssa Montgomery and Harlee Turnbow

Theme Music by CarlaD at https://soundcloud.com/carladmusic

Text by textcraft.net

Pixel avatars generated from http://www.avatarsinpixels.com/

Sound effects from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/

Pixel art made with https://www.piskelapp.com/
